mapper.select: SELECT B.BLACKLIST_NO, B.MEMBER_NO, M.NICKNAME, B.BLACKLIST_REASON, B.LIMIT_DATE, C.CODE_VALUE FROM BLACKLIST B, MEMBER M, COMMON C WHERE B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO AND B.BLACKLIST_REASON = C.CODE and m.member_id is not null ORDER BY BLACK_NO

SELECT B.BLACKLIST_NO, B.MEMBER_NO, M.NICKNAME, B.BLACKLIST_REASON, B.LIMIT_DATE, C.CODE_VALUE FROM BLACKLIST B, MEMBER M, COMMON C WHERE B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO AND B.BLACKLIST_REASON = C.CODE AND B.BLACKLIST_NO = #{blacklist_no}
